spell_tooltip.description: Disarm the enemy, preventing the use of any weapons or shield for 5 sec.
Feint decreases your damage taken by an additional 40% while stunned and its energy cost is reduced by 30%.
Creates a cloud of thick smoke in an 8 yard radius around the Rogue for 5 sec. Enemies are unable to target into or out of the smoke cloud.
Blinds the target, causing it to wander disoriented for 1 min. Damage may interrupt the effect. Limit 1.
Provides a moment of magic immunity, instantly removing all harmful spell effects. The cloak lingers, causing you to resist harmful spells for 7 sec.
Increases your dodge chance by 100% for 10 sec.

Gouges the eyes of an enemy target, incapacitating for 4 sec. Damage may interrupt the effect.

Must be in front of your target.

Awards 1 combo point.
Shadowstep has 1 additional charge.
Increases the non-damaging effects of your weapon poisons by 20%.
Evasion also reduces damage taken by 20%, and Feint also reduces non-area-of-effect damage taken by 20%.
Enemies have 30% reduced damage and healing for 6 sec after Blind or Sap's effect on them ends.
Wound Poison can now stack 2 additional times.
Energy cost of Feint and Crimson Vial reduced by 10.
Reduces the cooldown of Sprint by 60 sec.
While Stealth or Shadow Dance is active, you move 20% faster.
Movement speed increased by 15%.
Reduces the duration of movement slowing effects 30%.
Sprint increases movement speed by an additional 30% and has 4 sec increased duration.
The Energy costs of Kidney Shot, Cheap Shot, Sap, and Distract are reduced by 20%.
Physical damage taken reduced by 5%.
Feint has 1 additional charge.
Increases the critical strike chance of your attacks that generate combo points by 5%.
Auto-attacks increase auto-attack damage and movement speed by 1.0% for 3 sec, stacking up to 10%.
Shadowstrike generates 1 additional combo point.
Adds a Leeching effect to your Lethal poisons, granting you 3% Leech.
Slice and Dice heals you for up to 1% of your maximum health per 3 sec.
Your finishing moves have a 10% chance per combo point to grant 1% Haste for 15 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Increases your maximum Energy by 100 and Energy regeneration by 10%.

Symbols of Death supercharges 2 combo points.

Damaging finishing moves consume a supercharged combo point to function as if they spent 2 additional combo points.

Restore 100 Energy. Mastery increased by 19.6% for 6 sec.

When your Energy is reduced below 30, drink a Thistle Tea.
Increase the bonus granted when a damaging finishing move consumes a supercharged combo point by 1.

Gain 1 additional max combo point.

Your finishing moves that consume more than 5 combo points have increased effects, and your finishing moves deal 5% increased damage.
Your Stealth abilities reveal a flaw in your target's defenses, causing all your attacks to bypass 30% of that enemy's armor for 10 sec.

Backstab has 15% increased critical strike chance.

When you are behind your target, Backstab critical strikes now also expose a flaw in their defenses, applying Find Weakness for 10 sec.

Draws upon surrounding shadows to empower your weapons, causing your attacks to deal 20% additional damage as Shadow and causing your combo point generating abilities to generate full combo points for 16 sec.
After entering Stealth or Shadow Dance, your next Cheap Shot is free.
Shadowstep's cooldown is reduced by 20%, and its maximum range is increased by 20%.
Increases healing received by 8%.
Shroud of Concealment increases the movement speed of allies by 100% and leaving its area no longer cancels the effect.
Movement speed increased by 20% and damage taken reduced by 10% for 8 sec after gaining Stealth, Vanish, or Shadow Dance.
Symbols of Death has 5 sec reduced cooldown.
Shadow Dance has 2 sec increased duration.

Finishing move that creates shadow clones of yourself. You and your shadow clones each perform a piercing attack on all enemies near your target, dealing Physical damage to the primary target and reduced damage to other targets.
   1 point  : 102,479 total damage
   2 points: 201,950 total damage
   3 points: 308,728 total damage
   4 points: 409,951 total damage
   5 points: 504,052 total damage
   6 points: 596,522 total damage
   7 points: 704,257 total damage

Cooldown is reduced by 1 sec for every combo point you spend.
Your finishing moves generate 5 Energy per combo point spent.
After entering Stealth, your next combo point generating ability generates full combo points.
Shadow Dance has 1 additional charge.
Eviscerate and Black Powder deal an additional 30% damage as Shadow to targets with your Find Weakness active.

Gain 1 additional max combo point.

Your finishing moves that consume more than 5 combo points have increased effects, and your finishing moves deal 5% increased damage.
Rupture deals an additional 20% damage as Shadow and applies to 1 additional nearby enemy.
Backstab and Shadowstrike have a 15% chance to hit the target twice each time they deal damage.
Your finishing moves reduce the remaining cooldown on Shadow Dance by 0.5 sec per combo point spent.
Your abilities deal 5% increased magic damage.
After striking 4 times with Backstab, your next attack that generates combo points deals 50% increased damage.
Eviscerate and Black Powder increase your Shadow damage dealt by 8% for 8 sec.
Symbols of Death has 1 additional charge and increases damage by an additional 3%.
Shadow Dance increases damage by an additional 30%.
Eviscerate, Rupture, and Black Powder increase the damage of the next use of the same finishing move by 30%.

While Symbols of Death is active, your Shadow Techniques triggers 40% more frequently, stores 1 additional combo point, and finishing moves can use those stored when there are enough to refresh full combo points.
Shadow Dance increases the damage of your attacks that generate or spend combo points by 6%, increased by an additional 6% for each different attack used.

Your attacks that deal Nature or Bleed damage now deal Shadow instead.

Shadow damage increased by 10%.

Shadowstrike from Stealth or Shadow Dance applies 3 stacks of Deathstalker's Mark to your target. When you spend 5 or more combo points on attacks against a Marked target you consume an application of Deathstalker's Mark, dealing 180,091 Plague damage and increasing the damage of your next Backstab or Shadowstrike by 50%.
You may only have one target Marked at a time.
Your next Shuriken Storm after applying Deathstalker's Mark deals an additional 150,076 Plague damage and generates 1 additional combo point.
Auto-attacks against Marked targets deal an additional 37,519 Plague damage.
Damage dealt to targets other than your Marked target deals 5% Plague damage to your Marked target.
Your damaging abilities against enemies above 20% health have a very high chance to apply Fatal Intent. When an enemy falls below 20% health, Fatal Intent inflicts 32,363 Plague damage per stack.
Rupture deals an additional 3,751 Plague damage each time it deals damage, stacking up to 10 times. Rupture duration increased by 3 sec.
After Shadow Blades expires, gain 30 sec of 30% increased Shadow damage.
Cloak of Shadows duration increased by 2 sec.
If you have critically struck with Shuriken Storm, increase the critical strike chance of Shuriken Storm and Black Powder by 15% and critical strike damage by 32% for 12 sec.
Each time you consume a stack of Deathstalker's Mark, reduce the cooldown of Shadowstep by 3 sec.

When you consume the final Deathstalker's Mark from a target or your target dies, gain 40 Energy and your next Eviscerate cast with maximum combo points is guaranteed to critically strike, deals 60% additional damage, and applies 3 stacks of Deathstalker's Mark to the target.

Attack with your off-hand, dealing 55,821 Physical damage, dispelling all enrage effects and applying a concentrated form of your Crippling Poison, reducing movement speed by 84% for 5 sec.

Awards 1 combo point.
Blinds the target, causing it to wander disoriented for 1 min. Damage may interrupt the effect. Limit 1.
Provides a moment of magic immunity, instantly removing all harmful spell effects. The cloak lingers, causing you to resist harmful spells for 7 sec.
Increases your dodge chance by 100% for 10 sec.
Blind has 50% reduced cooldown, 70% reduced duration, and applies to all nearby enemies.
Shadowstep has 1 additional charge.
Increases the non-damaging effects of your weapon poisons by 20%.
Evasion also reduces damage taken by 20%, and Feint also reduces non-area-of-effect damage taken by 20%.
Redirects all threat you cause to the targeted party or raid member, beginning with your next damaging attack within the next 30 sec and lasting 6 sec.
Energy cost of Feint and Crimson Vial reduced by 10.
Reduces the cooldown of Sprint by 60 sec.
While Stealth or Shadow Dance is active, you move 20% faster.
Movement speed increased by 15%.
Increases the healing you receive from Crimson Vial, healing potions, and healthstones by 25%.
Sprint increases movement speed by an additional 30% and has 4 sec increased duration.

Coats your weapons with a Non-Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 30% chance of poisoning the enemy, clouding their mind and slowing their attack and casting speed by 18% for 10 sec.
Physical damage taken reduced by 5%.
Feint has 1 additional charge.
Increases the critical strike chance of your attacks that generate combo points by 5%.
Auto-attacks increase auto-attack damage and movement speed by 1.0% for 3 sec, stacking up to 10%.
Shadowstrike generates 1 additional combo point.
Adds a Leeching effect to your Lethal poisons, granting you 3% Leech.
Critical strike chance increased by 2%. Critical strike damage bonus of your attacks that generate combo points increased by 20%.
Slice and Dice heals you for up to 1% of your maximum health per 3 sec.
Your finishing moves have a 10% chance per combo point to grant 1% Haste for 15 sec, stacking up to 5 times.

Symbols of Death supercharges 2 combo points.

Damaging finishing moves consume a supercharged combo point to function as if they spent 2 additional combo points.
Increases the critical strike chance of your next damaging ability by 100%.
Increase the bonus granted when a damaging finishing move consumes a supercharged combo point by 1.

Gain 1 additional max combo point.

Your finishing moves that consume more than 5 combo points have increased effects, and your finishing moves deal 5% increased damage.
Your Stealth abilities reveal a flaw in your target's defenses, causing all your attacks to bypass 30% of that enemy's armor for 10 sec.

Backstab has 15% increased critical strike chance.

When you are behind your target, Backstab critical strikes now also expose a flaw in their defenses, applying Find Weakness for 10 sec.

Draws upon surrounding shadows to empower your weapons, causing your attacks to deal 20% additional damage as Shadow and causing your combo point generating abilities to generate full combo points for 16 sec.
Shuriken Storm has an additional 15% chance to crit, and its critical strikes apply Find Weakness for 10 sec.
After entering Stealth or Shadow Dance, your next Cheap Shot is free.
Your finishing moves heal you for 5% of damage done. At full health gain shielding instead, absorbing up to 10% of your maximum health.
Shroud of Concealment increases the movement speed of allies by 100% and leaving its area no longer cancels the effect.
Movement speed increased by 20% and damage taken reduced by 10% for 8 sec after gaining Stealth, Vanish, or Shadow Dance.
Symbols of Death has 5 sec reduced cooldown.
Shadow Dance has 2 sec increased duration.

Finishing move that creates shadow clones of yourself. You and your shadow clones each perform a piercing attack on all enemies near your target, dealing Physical damage to the primary target and reduced damage to other targets.
   1 point  : 102,780 total damage
   2 points: 197,703 total damage
   3 points: 304,980 total damage
   4 points: 407,329 total damage
   5 points: 493,597 total damage
   6 points: 604,570 total damage
   7 points: 705,892 total damage

Cooldown is reduced by 1 sec for every combo point you spend.
Your finishing moves generate 5 Energy per combo point spent.
After entering Stealth, your next combo point generating ability generates full combo points.
Shadow Dance has 1 additional charge.
Eviscerate and Black Powder deal an additional 30% damage as Shadow to targets with your Find Weakness active.

Gain 1 additional max combo point.

Your finishing moves that consume more than 5 combo points have increased effects, and your finishing moves deal 5% increased damage.
Rupture deals an additional 20% damage as Shadow and applies to 1 additional nearby enemy.
Remaining out of combat for 6 sec increases the duration of your next Shadow Dance by 4 sec.
Your finishing moves reduce the remaining cooldown on Shadow Dance by 0.5 sec per combo point spent.
Your abilities deal 5% increased magic damage.
Backstab and Shadowstrike extend the duration of your Symbols of Death by 0.5 sec.
Eviscerate and Black Powder increase your Shadow damage dealt by 8% for 8 sec.

Lash the target for 61,948 Shadow damage, causing each combo point spent within 12 sec to lash for an additional 12,597. Dealing damage with Flagellation increases your Mastery by 2.5%, persisting 12 sec after their torment fades.
Symbols of Death has 2 additional charges and increases damage by an additional 6%.
Shadow Dance increases damage by an additional 30%.
After activating Symbols of Death, your next 2 attacks that generate combo points deal 35% increased damage and are guaranteed to critically strike.

While Symbols of Death is active, your Shadow Techniques triggers 40% more frequently, stores 1 additional combo point, and finishing moves can use those stored when there are enough to refresh full combo points.
Shadow Dance increases the damage of your attacks that generate or spend combo points by 6%, increased by an additional 6% for each different attack used.
Attacks that generate combo points deal 50% increased critical strike damage to Fazed targets.
You take 5% reduced damage from Fazed targets.

Unseen Blade and Secret Technique increase the damage of your finishing moves by 3% for 12 sec.

Multiple applications may overlap.
Tricks of the Trade's threat redirect duration is increased to 1 hour.
Secret Technique applies Fazed to any targets struck.
Slice and Dice grants 10% additional attack speed and gives your auto-attacks a chance to refresh your opportunity to strike with Unseen Blade.
Secret Technique has 10% reduced cooldown and allows your next 2 strikes of Unseen Blade to ignore its cooldown.
Finishing moves have 10% increased chance to critically strike Fazed targets.
Your auto-attacks, Backstab, Shadowstrike, and Eviscerate also strike up to 7 additional nearby targets for 60% of normal damage while Flawless Form is active.

After 4 strikes with Unseen Blade, your next Eviscerate will be performed as a Coup de Grace, functioning as if it had consumed 5 additional combo points.

If the primary target is Fazed, gain 5 stacks of Flawless Form.
Blinds the target, causing it to wander disoriented for 1 min. Damage may interrupt the effect. Limit 1.
Provides a moment of magic immunity, instantly removing all harmful spell effects. The cloak lingers, causing you to resist harmful spells for 7 sec.
Increases your dodge chance by 100% for 10 sec.

Crippling Poison reduces movement speed by an additional 10%.

Shadowstrike generates 1 additional combo point.
Slice and Dice heals you for up to 1% of your maximum health per 3 sec.
Your finishing moves have a 10% chance per combo point to grant 1% Haste for 15 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
You are healed for 32% of your maximum health over 6 sec after activating Vanish.

Symbols of Death supercharges 2 combo points.

Damaging finishing moves consume a supercharged combo point to function as if they spent 2 additional combo points.

Abilities requiring Stealth can be used for 6 sec after Stealth breaks.

Combat benefits requiring Stealth persist for an additional 6 sec after Stealth breaks.
Increase the bonus granted when a damaging finishing move consumes a supercharged combo point by 1.

Gain 1 additional max combo point.

Your finishing moves that consume more than 5 combo points have increased effects, and your finishing moves deal 5% increased damage.
Vanish has 1 additional charge.
Your Stealth abilities reveal a flaw in your target's defenses, causing all your attacks to bypass 30% of that enemy's armor for 10 sec.

After entering Stealth or Shadow Dance, your next Cheap Shot is free.
Shadowstep's cooldown is reduced by 20%, and its maximum range is increased by 20%.

Shroud of Concealment increases the movement speed of allies by 100% and leaving its area no longer cancels the effect.
Vanish grants you a shield for 6 sec, absorbing damage equal to 18% of your maximum health.
Symbols of Death has 5 sec reduced cooldown.
Shadow Techniques generates 3 additional Energy.
Shadow Dance has 2 sec increased duration.

   1 point  : 99,422 total damage
   2 points: 200,787 total damage
   3 points: 294,871 total damage
   4 points: 406,207 total damage
   5 points: 512,652 total damage
   6 points: 588,174 total damage
   7 points: 711,011 total damage

Vanish has 1 additional charge.

Coats your weapons with a Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 30% chance to poison the enemy for 70,633 Nature damage over 12 sec. Subsequent poison applications will instantly deal 7,634 Nature damage.
Shiv now also increases your Nature damage done against the target by 30% for 8 sec.

You regain 8 Energy each time your Garrote or Rupture deal Bleed damage to a poisoned target.

If an enemy dies while afflicted by your Rupture, you regain energy based on its remaining duration.
Increases maximum Energy by 100.
Envenom's effect increases the damage of Envenom by 10%.
Garrote and Rupture damage increased by 15%.
Fan of Knives has 10% increased critical strike chance and its critical strikes always apply your weapon poisons.
Critical strikes with attacks that generate combo points grant an additional combo point per critical strike.

Using Mutilate on a target afflicted by your Rupture and Deadly Poison applies Caustic Spatter for 10 sec. Limit 1.

Caustic Spatter causes 40% of your Poison damage dealt to splash onto other nearby enemies, reduced beyond 5 targets.
Garrote deals 50% increased damage and has no cooldown when used from Stealth and for 6 sec after breaking Stealth.

Finishing move that slashes all enemies within 10 yards, causing victims to bleed. Lasts longer per combo point.

Deals extra damage when multiple enemies are afflicted, increasing by 20% per target, up to 100%.

Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

   1 point  : 130,085 over 6 sec
   2 points: 162,606 over 8 sec
   3 points: 195,127 over 10 sec
   4 points: 227,649 over 12 sec
   5 points: 260,170 over 14 sec
   6 points: 292,691 over 16 sec
Carve a deathmark into an enemy, dealing 286,755 Bleed damage over 16 sec. While marked your Garrote, Rupture, and Lethal poisons applied to the target are duplicated, dealing 100% of normal damage.
While above 50% of maximum Energy your Garrote, Rupture, and Crimson Tempest consume 2 Energy to duplicate 30% of any damage dealt.

Gain 1 additional max combo point.

Your finishing moves that consume more than 5 combo points have increased effects, and your finishing moves deal 5% increased damage.
Increases the damage of your weapon poisons by 10%.
Your weapon poisons, Nature damage over time, and Bleed abilities deal 2% increased damage to targets for each weapon poison, Nature damage over time, and Bleed effect on them.

Garrote silences the target for 5 sec when used from Stealth.

Enemies silenced by Garrote deal 15% reduced damage for 5 sec.

Coats your weapons with a Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 30% chance to poison the enemy, dealing 8,085 Nature damage and applying Amplifying Poison for 12 sec. Envenom can consume 10 stacks of Amplifying Poison to deal 35% increased damage. Max 20 stacks.
Mutilate deals an additional 20% Bleed damage over 8 sec.
Garrote damage increased by 20%. Garrote generates 2 additional combo points when used from Stealth.

Prepare a Serrated Bone Spike every 30 sec, stacking up to 3. Rupture spends a stack to embed a bone spike in its target.

 Serrated Bone Spike:
Deals 155,929 Physical damage and 15,613 Bleed damage every 3 sec until the target dies or leaves combat.

Refunds a stack when the target dies.

Awards 1 combo point plus 1 additional per active bone spike.
Envenom has a 8% chance per combo point spent to smash a vial of poison at the target's location, creating a pool of acidic death that deals 135,485 Nature damage over 2 sec to all enemies within it.
Each enemy afflicted by your Rupture increases your Agility by 4%, up to a maximum of 20%.

Release a lethal poison from your weapons and inject it into your target, dealing 154,856 Nature damage instantly and an additional 181,910 Nature damage over 14 sec. 

Each time you apply a Lethal Poison to a target affected by Kingsbane, Kingsbane damage increases by 20%, up to 1,000%.

Awards 1 combo point.
You may apply 1 additional Lethal and Non-Lethal Poison to your weapons, but they have 30% less application chance.
Garrote and Rupture apply to 2 additional nearby enemies when used from Stealth and for 6 sec after breaking Stealth.

Bleed damage increased by 15%.

Targets below 35% health instantly bleed out and take fatal damage when the remaining Bleed damage you would deal to them exceeds 150% of their remaining health.
Your next Shuriken Storm after applying Deathstalker's Mark deals an additional 150,076 Plague damage and generates 1 additional combo point.
Auto-attacks against Marked targets deal an additional 37,519 Plague damage.
Damage dealt to targets other than your Marked target deals 5% Plague damage to your Marked target.
Your damaging abilities against enemies above 20% health have a very high chance to apply Fatal Intent. When an enemy falls below 20% health, Fatal Intent inflicts 32,363 Plague damage per stack.
Rupture deals an additional 3,751 Plague damage each time it deals damage, stacking up to 10 times. Rupture duration increased by 3 sec.
After Shadow Blades expires, gain 30 sec of 30% increased Shadow damage.

Evasion reduces magical damage taken by 20%. 

Cloak of Shadows reduces physical damage taken by 20%.
Shuriken Storm and Black Powder deal 30% additional damage while 2 or more enemies are afflicted with Rupture.
Each time you consume a stack of Deathstalker's Mark, reduce the cooldown of Shadowstep by 3 sec.

When you consume the final Deathstalker's Mark from a target or your target dies, gain 40 Energy and your next Eviscerate cast with maximum combo points is guaranteed to critically strike, deals 60% additional damage, and applies 3 stacks of Deathstalker's Mark to the target.

Attack with your off-hand, dealing 57,068 Physical damage, dispelling all enrage effects and applying a concentrated form of your Crippling Poison, reducing movement speed by 84% for 5 sec.

Awards 1 combo point.
Blinds the target, causing it to wander disoriented for 1 min. Damage may interrupt the effect. Limit 1.
Provides a moment of magic immunity, instantly removing all harmful spell effects. The cloak lingers, causing you to resist harmful spells for 7 sec.
Increases your dodge chance by 100% for 10 sec.

Gouges the eyes of an enemy target, incapacitating for 4 sec. Damage may interrupt the effect.

Must be in front of your target.

Awards 1 combo point.
Shadowstep has 1 additional charge.
Increases the non-damaging effects of your weapon poisons by 20%.
Evasion also reduces damage taken by 20%, and Feint also reduces non-area-of-effect damage taken by 20%.
Enemies have 30% reduced damage and healing for 6 sec after Blind or Sap's effect on them ends.
Wound Poison can now stack 2 additional times.
Reduces the cooldown of Sprint by 60 sec.
While Stealth or Shadow Dance is active, you move 20% faster.
Movement speed increased by 15%.
Sprint increases movement speed by an additional 30% and has 4 sec increased duration.
The Energy costs of Kidney Shot, Cheap Shot, Sap, and Distract are reduced by 20%.
Leech increased by 2% while Stealthed.
Physical damage taken reduced by 5%.
Feint has 1 additional charge.
Increases the critical strike chance of your attacks that generate combo points by 5%.
Auto-attacks increase auto-attack damage and movement speed by 1.0% for 3 sec, stacking up to 10%.
Energy cost of finishing moves reduced by 6%.
Adds a Leeching effect to your Lethal poisons, granting you 3% Leech.
Your finishing moves have a 10% chance per combo point to grant 1% Haste for 15 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
You are healed for 32% of your maximum health over 6 sec after activating Vanish.
Increases your maximum Energy by 100 and Energy regeneration by 10%.

Abilities requiring Stealth can be used for 6 sec after Stealth breaks.

Combat benefits requiring Stealth persist for an additional 6 sec after Stealth breaks.

Restore 100 Energy. Mastery increased by 19.6% for 6 sec.

When your Energy is reduced below 30, drink a Thistle Tea.
